Package org.directwebremoting.convert

Class Summary
ArrayConverter An implementation of Converter for Arrays.
BaseV20Converter A way to migrate from the DWRv2.0 Converter style to something in the future.
BasicObjectConverter BasicObjectConverter is a parent to BeanConverter and ObjectConverter an provides support for include and exclude lists, and instanceTypes.
BeanConverter Convert a Javascript associative array into a JavaBean
BigNumberConverter Converter for all primitive types
CharArrayConverter An implementation of Converter for char arrays.
CollectionConverter An implementation of Converter for Collections of Strings.
ConstructorConverter An implementation of Converter for anything with a string constructor.
DateConverter An implementation of Converter for Dates.
DOM4JConverter An implementation of Converter for DOM objects.
DOMConverter An implementation of Converter for DOM objects.
EnumConverter Converter for all primitive types
ExceptionConverter A special case of BeanConverter that doesn't convert StackTraces
JDOMConverter An implementation of Converter for DOM objects.
MapConverter An implementation of Converter for Maps.
MinimalistExceptionConverter A special case of BeanConverter for use by default with Throwables, which only outputs a "broken" message.
NullConverter An implementation of Converter for null and undefined.
ObjectConverter Convert a Javascript associative array into a JavaBean
PlainProperty An implementation of Property that simply uses stored values.
PrimitiveConverter Converter for all primitive types
ServletConverter A converter that magics up HTTP objects
StringConverter An implementation of Converter for Strings.
URLConverter An implementation of Converter for Strings.
XOMConverter An implementation of Converter for DOM objects.
